effect_entries.effect:
Held: Raises the holder's critical hit counter by 1.
Held by Sneasel: Evolves the holder into Weavile when it levels up during the night.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Raises the holder's critical hit ratio by one stage. Held by a Sneasel while levelling up at night: Holder evolves into Weavile.

flavor_text_entries.text:
鋭く　とがった　ツメ。
持たせると　技が　急所に
当たりやすくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
This sharply hooked claw increases
the holder’s critical-hit ratio.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Artiglio che aumenta la probabilità di sferrare
brutti colpi.

Impresionante pared de luz que reduce el daño
de los ataques especiales durante cinco turnos.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Die scharfe Klaue erhöht die
Volltrefferquote des Trägers.

Objet à tenir. Une griffe crochue et pointue
augmentant le taux de critiques.

날카롭고 뾰족한 손톱.
지니게 하면 기술이
급소에 맞기 쉬워진다.

するどく　とがった　ツメ。
もたせると　わざが　きゅうしょに
あたりやすくなる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a sharply hooked claw that ups
the holder’s critical-hit ratio.
